attributes.value: Eliminations grant 10% Attack Speed and 15% Move Speed for 3s.
After healing an ally, gain 10% Attack Speed for 3s.
After dealing damage to Shields or Armor, gain 15% Attack Speed for 1s.
While not holding [Jagged Blade], [Quick Melee] deals 75% more damage and knocks back.
[Commanding Shout] grants you 15% Attack Speed.
Recover from being [Overheated] 50% faster.
Deal 25% more damage to enemies farther than 12m away.
Critical hits reduce your [Heat] by 5%.
[Energy] cannot be reduced below 20.
Gain 3% Attack Speed for each remaining Ammo above 50% of your Max Ammo.
[The Viper], [Coach Gun], and [Dynamite] deal 10% more damage to enemies that are below you.
Reloading within 6m of an enemy adds 20% of Max Ammo as extra Ammo.
While climbing, restore 20% of your ammo every Is.
Using [Shadow Step] restores 100% of your ammo.
When you use [Helix Rocket], restore 20% of your ammo.
For each enemy or ally affected by [Biotic Grenade], gain 5% Attack Speed, up to 25%.
Unscoped [Biotic Rifle] projectiles are 100% larger.
Deal 20% more damage to airborne enemies.
While airborne, [Mediblaster] deals 15% more damage.
[Kunai] bounce off surfaces 1 time.
When you deal damage, gain 200% [Healing Ofuda] Projectile Speed for 5s.
When you heal an ally, grant them 10% Move Speed for 3s.

While airborne gain:
  • 5% Weapon Power
  • 10% Attack Speed
[Biotic Grasp]'s secondary fire restores 50% more [Biotic Energy].
When [Take Aim] bolt sticks an enemy, increase your Attack Speed by 20% for 3s.
[Gravitic Flux] levitates enemies for 25% longer. Enemies affected take 20% increased damage from [Hyperspheres].
Deal 10% increased damage and 25% [Quick Melee] damage to enemies that are airborne.
While you are below 150 Life, gain 15% Weapon Lifesteal.
Ignore 50% of Armor's damage reduction.
Dealing Weapon Damage to Barriers has a 50% chance to restore 1 ammo.
Deal 5% increased Weapon Damage for every 100 Max Life the target has more than you, up to 20%.
When you use an ability, restore 10% of your Max Ammo.
Dealing Weapon Damage negates 10% of the target's bonus Attack Speed and increase your Attack speed by 10% for 2s.
While healing an ally below 50% Life with your weapon, deal 15% increased Weapon Healing
When you use an ability, gain 10% Move Speed for 2s.
Critical Hits apply 30% Healing Reduction to the target for 2s.
When you use an ability, gain 5% Weapon Power for 3s, stacking up to 3 times.
Critical Hits reveal the target for 3s.
Deal 10% increased damage to enemies below 30% Life.
[Fusion Cannons] can now be fired while using [Defense Matrix].
When you [Wound an enemy, gain 10% Attack Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times.
Gain 5% Weapon Power for each enemy with a [Wound] within 12m.
When you deal more damage with [Rocket Hammer], reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 1s.
Gain 3% Attack Speed every 100 missing Life, up to 30%.
Consecutive [Particle Cannon] secondary fire shots consume 20% less Ammo, up to 60%, for your current magazine.
[Particle Cannon]'s primary fire range is increased by 20%
When the target is further than 10m, scoped shot gains 1% damage for each meter.
When the target is within 10m, unscoped shot gains 25% increased damage.
Deal 15% increased primary fire damage to enemies in the Damage role.
[Quick Melee] can critically hit when striking enemies from behind, dealing 50% increased damage.
Damaging an enemy with [Swift Strike] restores 20% of your ammo.
Max Ammo is increased by 75% but reloading takes 50% longer.
Frozen ground increases Mei's Movement Speed by 35%.
While within [Blizzard], gain 10% Attack Speed.
Every 3rd shot fires both of your [Hellfire Shotguns]. The extra shot does not consume ammo but deals 80% reduced damage.
After using [Pulsar Torpedoes], gain 25% Attack Speed for 4s.
[Mediblaster] deals 15% increased damage and healing to targets farther than 12m away.
During [Glide Boost], gain 20% Attack Speed and your [Quick Melee] knocks enemies back.
After using an ability, restore 100% of your ammo.
After using [Soundwave], your next [Quick Melee] grants decaying Overhealth equal to 200% of damage dealt.
[Sonic Amplifier] projectiles ricochet off walls 3 times.
[Caduceus Blaster] has a 10% chance to fire an extra shot that doesn't consume additional ammo.
When you use [Fade], refill your [Biotic Energy].
Eliminations reset both charges of [Quick Dash] Cooldown.
After detonating [Concussion Mine], your next 2 [Frag Launcher] shots gain 200% Projectile Speed and deal 10% increased damage to airborne enemies.
After using [Harmony Orb] or [Discord Orb], gain 100% Projectile Speed for
[Orb of Destruction]'s secondary fire charges 20% faster.
Targets affected by [Discord Orb] are Revealed.
Weapon dealing damage to airborne enemies deal 25% bonus damage over 3s.
After you spend your Ultimate Charge, gain 25 Armor and 10% Ability Power for the rest of the round.
When you die, gain 15% Ultimate Charge.
When you spend your Ultimate Charge, grant nearby allies 75 Overhealth for 3s.
If your [Mech] detonates while mid-air, increase [Self-Destruct] explosion damage and range by 100%.
Every 200 damage you mitigate with [Defense Matrix] reduces [Micro Missiles] cooldown by 1s.
Using [Self-Destruct] drops lava nearby that deals 80 damage every 1s.
[Jagged Blade]'s pull strength is increased by 35%.
[Energy Javelin] deals 25% increased damage to enemies farther than 12m away.
If [Charge] is interrupted by the enemy, refund 50% of [Charge] cooldown.
Cleansed Burns grant 3% Ultimate Charge.
Damage dealt to Burning targets grants 20% more Ultimate Charge.
[Deadeye] eliminations reduce [Flashbang] max cooldown by 10%, up to 40% for the round.
[Combat Roll] reduces [Flashbang] cooldown by 2s.
[Swift Strike] cooldown is reduced by 50% if it deals no damage.
When you damage yourself with [Helix Rocket], it knocks you back 200% further.
Landing a [Sleep Dart] on enemies reduces its cooldown by 35%. Does not stack.
When you use an ability, gain 20% Attack Speed for 3s.
When allies leave your [Crossfade] area, the effect lingers for 2s.
While in [Speed Boost], [Soundwave] also knocks you back.
Environmental Kills grant [Nano Boost] for 5s.
[Biotic Orb] moves 50% slower while it is healing or dealing damage.
During [Coalescence], gain free flight.
While [Javelin Spin] is active, gain 50% damage reduction from beams.
When you deal damage with [Accretion], gain 5% Ability Power, stacking up to 4 times. Resets on miss.
After detonating [Rip Tire], trigger [Total Mayhem] after 0.5s.
[Steel Trap] refunds 33% cooldown when destroyed.
[Harmony Orb] heals airborne allies for 15% more.
While [Transcendence] is active, its radius increases by 1m every 1s.
While you are above 80% Life, gain 10% Ability Power.
After using an ability, nearby enemies are Revealed to you for 3s.
[Death Blossom] gains 4% Ability Power for each enemy within its range.
After using an ability, your next 3 instances of Weapon Damage deal additional damage equal to 3% of the target's Life.
When you use an ability that heals, reduce its cooldown by 5% for each unique ally it heals.
Ability Damage and Healing grants 20% more Ultimate Charge.
When you use an ability, restore 50 Armor or Shields over 2s.
When you deal Weapon Damage or Healing, gain 5% Ability Power for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.
Dealing Ability Damage applies 30% Healing Reduction for 2s.
After spending your Ultimate Charge, gain 100 Overhealth for 3s.
Dealing Ability Damage slows the target's Move Speed by 20% for 3s.
When you use an ability, your next instance of Weapon Damage or Healing deals 25 bonus damage or healing.
[Light Gun] gains a secondary fire, which charges up to fire a explosive piercing shot that deals 80 damage.
[Micro Missiles] deal 25% increased damage and have significantly increased knockback.
The quantity and duration of [Micro Missiles] is increased by 20%.
[Rampage] and [Carnage] hits grant 10% Attack Speed for 4s.
[Commanding Shout] will affect allies that are out of line of sight.
[Energy Javelin] cooldown is reduced by 15%, but each use generates 25 [Heat].
While using [Javelin Spin], gain free flight and 20% Move Speed.
You can now fly during [Charge].
After [Particle Barrier] is destroyed or expires, gain decaying Overhealth equal to 50% of damage mitigated during [Particle Barrier].
Restore Life equal to 30% of damage mitigated by [Projected Barrier].
Deal 20% increased damage to Burning enemies.
[Coach Gun] has 50% increased self knockback.
[Flashbang] explosion radius is increased by 50%.
During [Swift Strike], deflect incoming projectiles toward your reticle.
Ability Power is increased by 5% per each spawned Ice Pillars.
On near death, go into [Cryo-Freeze] and gain 15% Ultimate Charge. Can happen once every round.
[Blizzard] deals 100% increased base damage.
When you spend your Ultimate Charge, reset all cooldowns. While [Tactical Visor] is active, gain 20% Cooldown Reduction.
[Biotic Field] heals allies below 50% Life 10% more.
[Sleep Dart] direct hit deals 100 bonus damage.
[Biotic Grenade] cooldown is reduced by 2s for each target it hits.

[Sleep Dart] gains:
  • 500% Collision Size
  • 100% Projectile Speed
  • 20% Sleep Duration
[Pulsar Torpedoes] explode on hit, dealing 20 damage.
Allies affected by [Hyper Ring] restore 25 Shields every Is.
When you use [Orbital Ray], reset your cooldowns.
[Swift Step] heals nearby allies by 80 Life over 2s.
Allies affected by [Kitsune Rush] are healed for 80 every Is.
[Protection Suzu] grants 25% Attack Speed and 25% Move Speed for 4s.
[Sound Barrier] effectiveness is increased by 25% for every Is [Sound Barrier] is channeled, up to 50%.
[Guardian Angell's cooldown starts as soon as you jump or crouch.
Allies healed by [Coalescence] deal 15% increased damage.
[Bola Shot] pulls in nearby enemies even when it misses with 50% reduced pull strength.
Whenever [Total Mayhem] deals damage, gain 3% Ultimate Charge.
If [Concussion Mine] is 5m above the ground when detonated, increase its explosion radius by 25%.
Enemies that trigger [Steel Trap] Burn for 50 damage over 3s.
Increase your healing by up to 20%, based on how close you are to your target.
Allies affected by [Transcendence] have their cooldowns refresh 15% faster.
After [Transcendence] ends, gain Overhealth equal to 100% of the healing it did.
For each additional enemy [Fire Strike] damages beyond the initial target, reduce [Fire Strike] cooldown by 5%
When [Death Blossom] starts, gain Overhealth equal to 5% of your max Life for each enemy within its range.
Passive Life Regeneration can overheal up to 75.
Health Packs grant 20% Move Speed for 5s and 50 Overhealth.
At the start of the round and every time you respawn, gain 100 unrecoverable Overhealth.
While on the Objective, restore 8 Life every 1s.
At the start of the round and when you first respawn, gain 20% Move Speed for IOS while out of combat.
Reduce the time before your Life begins regenerating by 33%.
Enemies below 30% Life are Revealed to you.
[Quick Melee] damage heals for 25 Life.
While you have Shields, take 15% reduced Ability Damage.
When affected by Stun, Sleep , or Hinder, restore 10% of your max Life over 3s.
When you use an ability, gain 25 Overhealth for 3s.
Convert 100 Health into Shields.
Convert 100 Health into Armor.
While you have Armor, take 10% reduced Weapon Damage.
You take 20% reduced damage from Critical Hits.
While [Defense Matrix] is active, gain 65% damage reduction against beams.
When you mitigate damage with [Defense Matrix], gain Shields equal to 10% of the damage mitigated, up to 100. Resets when your [Mech] is destroyed.
When knocked back, gain 25% increased Move Speed for 3s.
When [Wound] gets removed instead of expiring, gain 10% of Max Life as Overhealth, up to 150.
While within 12m of an enemy with a [Wound], gain 5% Move Speed and 10% Attack Speed.
[Fortify] grants additional Overhealth equal to 10% of your max Life.
When you deal damage with [Energy Javelin], heal 10% of your max Life over 3s.
After using an ability, restore Armor equal to 3% of your max Life.
Using [Charge] cleanses all negative effects.
Holding crouch increases the height of your next jump by up to 200%.
[Particle Cannon]'s secondary fire self knockback is increased by 100% and no longer damages yourself.
After using a [Barrier], start regenerating Shields instantly.
While [Particle Barrier] is active, become unstoppable and [Quick Melee] knocks back enemies.
After using [Coach Gun], gain 20% Move Speed for 5s and reload 25% of max ammo.
[Deadeye] eliminations reward extra 500 Stadium Cash each.
[Deflect] now blocks Beam attacks.
While climbing, heal 5% of your Life every 1s.
Gain an additional jump.
Primary fire and [Blizzard] can remove burn.
[Cryo-Freeze] duration is increased by 25%.
Each [Death Blossom] elimination increases your Health by 25 until the end of the round, up to 75 Health.
Reduce effectiveness of enemy slows by 50%.
While below 50% Life, gain 20% Move Speed.
Jumping in mid-air will dash you a short distance.
While affected by [Biotic Grenade], Ana gains 150 Overhealth.
Gain the ability to [Double Jump].
After [Wallriding], gain 30% Move Speed for 2s.
While affected by [Angelic Descent], continuously gain 10% Move Speed every Is up to 60%.
While affected by [Angelic Descent] or [Guardian Angel], heal 3% of your Life every IS.
While using [Fade], you jump 30% higher.
While momentum is slowed by [Take Aim], restore 5% Max Life every 1s.

Enemies with a Bounty of 750 or more are revealed to you within 40m.
Eliminating them grants 350 additional Stadium Cash.
After using [Updraft], reset [Quick Dash] and gain 50 Overhealth for 5s.
While behind [Experimental Barrier], gain 5% Weapon Power and Attack Speed. While in front of [Experimental Barrier], gain 10% Move Speed and Weapon Lifesteal.
While [Kinetic Grasp] is active, reduce incoming Beam damage by 50%.
When [Steel Trap] triggers, reveal the target and gain 25% Move Speed and 10% Attack Speed for 3s.
While airborne, hold Jump to hover for up to 3s.
When you charge an orb with [Orb of Destruction]'s secondary fire, restore for 3% of your Life.
Eliminating an enemy affected by [Discord Orb] grants 5 Armor for the rest of the round, up to 50 Armor.
While aiming [Pulsar Torpedoes], gain Overhealth equal to 25% of your max Shields.
The first time you would die each round, revive instead with 250 Life after 3s.
The last enemy to deal a final blow to you is Revealed when nearby. Deal 10% more damage to them and take 10% reduced damage from them.
When you take more than 100 damage at once, restore 20% of damage taken and start regenerating your Shields.
[Melee] Damage grants 10% Move Speed and restores 5% of Max Life over 2s.
Restore 3% of your Life every 1s.
While at full Life, Lifesteal grants up to 100 Overhealth.
While below 30% Life, gain 10% Damage Reduction.

While at 100% Ultimate Charge, gain:
  • 50 Health
  • 10% Weapon Power
  • 10% Ability Power
  • 10% Attack Speed
  • 10% Cooldown Reduction
  • 10% Move Speed
Prevent 15% of incoming damage and instead take that prevented damage over 3s.
When you take damage, gain 0.5% Damage Reduction for Is, stacking up to 20 times.
When you use [Boosters], other allies within 16m gain 25% Move Speed for 2s.
When you deal damage to Barriers while in your [Mech], gain Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt, up to 200. Resets when your [Mech] is destroyed.
Gain 10% of damage mitigated by [Defense Matrix] as Ultimate Charge.
When you eject from your [Mech], gain [Nano Boost] for 4s.
[Carnage] and [Jagged Blade] impact damage grants Overhealth equal to 40% of damage dealt.
While casting [Rampage] or [Carnage], gain 75% Damage Reduction.
Allies affected by [Commanding Shout] are healed for 5% of Junker Queen's life every second.
When you use [Fortify], allies within line of sight gain Unstoppable for 2s.
While [Barrier Field] is deployed, you gain 30% Move Speed.
[Barrier Field] regenerates 50% faster and begins regenerating 50% sooner after being destroyed.
Your Burning effects gain 35% Lifesteal.
When [B.O.B.] finishes charging, [B.O.B.] gains 300 Armor.
Heal 10 Life for each Ammo loaded using [Combat Roll].
Take 25% less damage from enemies farther than 12m.
Convert 100 Health into Armor. Using [Dragonblade] heals your Armor fully.
[Ice Wall] Duration is increased by 1s and health is increased by 100%.
While using [Wraith Form], gain the ability to fly and gain 20% Move Speed.
While using [Sprint], gain Overhealth equal to 5% of your max Life every 1s, up to 25%, for 5s.
[Nano Boost] can target allies through walls and its range is increased to 60m.
During [Glide Boost], gain 10% Damage Reduction.
[Orbital Ray] gains 25% increased healing.
After using [Swift Step], gain 100 Overhealth for 4s.
[Protection Suzu] grants 100 Overhealth for 5s.
After [Wallriding], gain an additional jump while airborne.
Your launch velocity is increased by 25% when canceling [Guardian Angel] with crouch or jump.
[Take Aim] bolt sticks and explosions slow enemies by 30%, but takes Is longer to explode.
[Experimental Barrier] heals nearby allies for 3% of your max Life every 1s.
For each target detonated by [Concussion Mine], gain Overhealth equal to 5% of Max Life for 3s.
For every 50 Armor you have, gain 5% [Quick Melee] Damage.
When your Shields are depleted, knock back nearby enemies, dealing 80 damage. Can only trigger every 6s after Shields are fully restored.
Allies affected by [Harmony Orb] take 10% reduced Ability Damage.
During [Glide Boost], gain 10% Damage Reduction.
Once per life, if you take damage that would reduce you below 30% Max Life, first gain 300 decaying Overhealth.

D.VA.name: FOCUSED FUSION
D.VA.description: [Fusion Cannon]'s spread is reduced by 50% and damage falloff range is 20m farther.

D.VA.name: LEGENDARY LOADOUT
D.VA.description: [Micro Missiles] are replaced with 6 Heavy Rockets, which deal 350% more explosive damage and have 100% increased radius.

D.VA.name: COUNTERMEASURES
D.VA.description: When you mitigate 100 damage with [Defense Matrix], automatically fire 2 [Micro Missiles].

D.VA.name: FACETANKING
D.VA.description: [Defense Matrix] heals you for 30% of the damage it blocks.

D.VA.name: ULTRAWIDE MATRIX
D.VA.description: Increase the size of [Defense Matrix] by 50% and its duration by 25%.

D.VA.name: IGNITION BURST
D.VA.description: [Boosters] leave a trail of lava that deals 80 damage every 1s.

D.VA.name: MEKA PUNCH
D.VA.description: While using [Boosters], [Quick Melee] deals 50% more damage. MEKA Punch and booster eliminations reset the cooldown of [Boosters].

D.VA.name: STAT BOOST
D.VA.description: During the first 2s of [Boosters], [Defense Matrix] recovers 125% faster.

D.VA.name: TOKKI SLAM
D.VA.description: During [Boosters], use crouch to slam the ground, dealing damage equal to 20% of your max Armor and knocking up enemies hit.

D.VA.name: PARTY PROTECTOR
D.VA.description: When you use [Self-Destruct], allies within [Self-Destruct] radius gain 250 Overhealth for 8s.

Junker Queen.name: THRILL OF BATTLE
Junker Queen.description: [Adrenaline Rush] also heals allies within 12m for 50% of the amount it heals you.

Junker Queen.name: ROYAL BULLETS
Junker Queen.description: [Scattergun] critical hits against targets within 15m applies [Wound] for 50 damage over 3s.

Junker Queen.name: TWIST THE KNIFE
Junker Queen.description: [Scattergun] critical hits extend the duration of all [Wounds] on the target by 1s.

Junker Queen.name: BLADE PARADE
Junker Queen.description: Holding [Jagged Blade] charges it, increasing its damage by up to 100% and causing it to knockback.

Junker Queen.name: CUT 'EM, GRACIE!
Junker Queen.description: Each enemy hit by [Jagged Blade] while it returns to you reduces its cooldown by 2s.

Junker Queen.name: LET'S GO WIN
Junker Queen.description: Eliminations reset the cooldown of [Commanding Shout] by 50%.

Junker Queen.name: MERCILESS MAGNETISM
Junker Queen.description: Using [Commanding Shout] causes your [Jagged Blade] to home to a target.

Junker Queen.name: RECKONER'S ROAR
Junker Queen.description: Using [Commanding Shout] [Wounds] enemies within 10m for 30 damage over 3s.

Junker Queen.name: CHOP CHOP
Junker Queen.description: [Carnage] gains an additional charge but its cooldown reduction per hit is reduced to 1s.

Junker Queen.name: SOARING STONE
Junker Queen.description: [Carnage] becomes a leaping strike if you jump during its cast time.

Junker Queen.name: BLOODCRAZED
Junker Queen.description: [Rampage] and [Carnage] gives 15% of Max Life as Overhealth per hit.

Junker Queen.name: BOW DOWN
Junker Queen.description: [Rampage] now also knocks down enemies hit for 1.5s.

Orisa.name: SCORCHED EARTH
Orisa.description: When you [Overheat], apply Burning to enemies within 6m, dealing damage equal to 20% of your max Life over 5s.

Orisa.name: SHIELD DIVERGENCE
Orisa.description: When you [Overheat], deploy a Barrier with 600 Health in front.

Orisa.name: ADVANCED THROWBOTICS
Orisa.description: When you use [Javelin Spin], launch an [Energy Javelin] with 50% less damage.

Orisa.name: HOT ROTATE-O
Orisa.description: [Javelin Spin] gains 35% Cooldown Reduction but now generates [Heat].

Orisa.name: SPYNSTEM UPDATE
Orisa.description: [Javelin Spin] now deflects projectiles and grants 20% of damage dealt from deflecting as Ultimate Charge.

Orisa.name: FACTORY RESET
Orisa.description: While [Fortify] is active, [Javelin Spin] and [Energy Javelin] gain 25% Cooldown Reduction.

Orisa.name: HOOVES OF STEEL
Orisa.description:
After [Fortify] ends, gain Shields equal to 50% of the damage received during [Fortify].
Resets when you next use [Fortify].

Orisa.name: RESTORTIFY
Orisa.description: While [Fortify] is active, heal for 5% of your max Life every 1s.

Orisa.name: RIDE WITH ME
Orisa.description: While [Fortify] is active, grant allies in line of sight 30% Move Speed and Overhealth equal to 10% of your max Life.

Orisa.name: LASSOED
Orisa.description: On impact, [Energy Javelin] will pull enemies within 4m towards itself.

Orisa.name: CENTRIPETAL CHARGE
Orisa.description:
25% Ultimate Cost Reduction.
After using [Terra Surge], reset your ability cooldowns.

Orisa.name: SUPERCHARGER
Orisa.description: When you use [Terra Surge], drop a [Supercharger] that increases the damage of nearby allies by 25% for 15s.

Reinhardt.name: AMPLIFICATION BARRIER
Reinhardt.description: Friendly projectiles that pass through your [Barrier Field] deal 15% more damage.

Reinhardt.name: BARRIER RECONSTRUCTION
Reinhardt.description: When you deal damage with [Rocket Hammer] or [Fire Strike], restore health to [Barrier Field] equal to 15% of its max Health.

Reinhardt.name: TO ME, MY FRIENDS!
Reinhardt.description: While [Barrier Field] is active, allies within 5m are healed equal to 5% of your max Life every 1s.

Reinhardt.name: INFUSION GENERATOR
Reinhardt.description: Increase [Barrier Field] Health by 250% of your Bonus Max Life.

Reinhardt.name: SHIELD STAMPEDE
Reinhardt.description: +50% [Charge] Knockback Power. During [Charge], automatically deploy [Barrier Field].

Reinhardt.name: VANGUARD
Reinhardt.description: [Charge] grants nearby allies Overhealth equal to 10% of your max Life and 20% Move Speed for 3s.

Reinhardt.name: VROOM BOOM BOOM
Reinhardt.description: During [Charge], colliding with a wall triggers an explosion that deals 30% of [Charge]'s pin damage.

Reinhardt.name: BLAZING BLITZ
Reinhardt.description: After using [Earthshatter], every [Rocket Hammer] swing launches a [Fire Strike] for 4s.

Reinhardt.name: IMPACT BURST
Reinhardt.description: [Fire Strike] triggers an explosion the first time it hits an enemy, dealing 30% of its damage in a 3m radius.

Reinhardt.name: MAGMA STRIKE
Reinhardt.description: Every second [Fire Strike] leaves a trail of lava that Burns enemies for 50% of [Fire Strike] damage.

Reinhardt.name: FEELING THE BURN
Reinhardt.description: Every 3rd [Rocket Hammer] swing applies Burn, dealing 30% [Rocket Hammer] damage over 2s.

Reinhardt.name: SMASHING!
Reinhardt.description: When you deal damage with [Rocket Hammer], gain 1% Move Speed and 3% Weapon Lifesteal for 2s, stacking up to 10 times.

Zarya.name: NO LIMITS
Zarya.description: Maximum [Energy] increased to 125. [Energy] always decays above 100 [Energy] at a 150% faster rate.

Zarya.name: PARTICLE ACCELERATOR
Zarya.description: Gain 15% Attack Speed for [Particle Cannon]'s secondary fire. After using an ability, quadruple this bonus for 5s.

Zarya.name: PIERCING BEAM
Zarya.description: Above 80 [Energy], [Particle Cannon]'s Primary Fire will pierce enemies.

Zarya.name: PRE-WORKOUT
Zarya.description: Gain Weapon Lifesteal and Ability Lifesteal equal to 15% of [Energy].

Zarya.name: BARRIER BENEFITS
Zarya.description: When [Barriers] expire, grant Overhealth equal to 100% of remaining Barrier Health to the target for 2s

Zarya.name: CONTAINMENT SHIELD
Zarya.description: [Barrier] heals the target for 5% of your Max Life every 1s and grants 20% Move Speed while active.

Zarya.name: FISSION FIELD
Zarya.description: [Projected Barrier] also applies to 1 additional ally within 10m, but has 25% reduced maximum [Energy] gain and 20% reduced duration.

Zarya.name: HERE TO SPOT YOU
Zarya.description: [Projected Barrier] pulls you to the targeted ally and heals you for 20% of Max Life over 3s.

Zarya.name: LIFELIFT
Zarya.description:
+50% [Particle Barrier] Size.
Increase [Barrier] Health by 50% of Bonus Max Life from Items.

Zarya.name: MAJOR FLEX
Zarya.description: [Barrier] knocks back and deals 25 damage, increased by [Energy], to enemies within 5m every 1s.

Zarya.name: VOLSKAYA VORTEX
Zarya.description: After a [Barrier] is cast, [Particle Cannon]'s next secondary fire spawns a slowing vortex that deals 80 damage over 2s.

Zarya.name: GRAVITON ANOMALY
Zarya.description:
25% Ultimate Cost Reduction.
[Graviton Surge] base damage is increased to 30 and increased by [Energy], but has 50% reduced duration.

Ashe.name: HEAD HONCHO
Ashe.description: Each unscoped shot you land increases the damage of the next scoped shot you land by 5%, up to 30%. Resets on reload.

Ashe.name: INCENDIARY ROUNDS
Ashe.description: While scoped, hitting the same target without missing deals 30 extra damage.

Ashe.name: MY BUSINESS, MY RULES
Ashe.description: When you deal damage to a Burning enemy with [The Viper], reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 10%.

Ashe.name: RELOAD THERAPY
Ashe.description: When you reload a shot, heal 10% of your Life.

Ashe.name: CALAMITY
Ashe.description: Using [Coach Gun] reloads 2 Ammo. [The Viper]'s next 2 hits deal 40 additional damage over 3s.

Ashe.name: INCENDIARY BLAST
Ashe.description: [Coach Gun] applies Burning, dealing 100 damage over 5s. If the target was Burning, deal 75 additional damage instantly.

Ashe.name: EARLY DETONATION
Ashe.description: Shooting [Dynamite] reloads 5 Ammo and reduces the cooldown of [Dynamite] by 3s.

Ashe.name: MOLTEN MUNITIONS
Ashe.description: When [Dynamite] explodes on the ground, it leaves lava that Burns enemies for 80 every 1s.

Ashe.name: OUT WITH A BANG
Ashe.description: When [Dynamite] explodes, it spawns 3 sticky explosives that deal 30% reduced damage.

Ashe.name: B.O.B JR.
Ashe.description: [B.O.B.] costs 50% less Ultimate Charge but has reduced Life, 20% reduced Attack Speed, and is significantly smaller.

Ashe.name: PARTNERS IN CRIME
Ashe.description: You are healed for 100% of [B.O.B.]'s damage dealt and [B.O.B.] is healed for 100% of your damage dealt.

Cassidy.name: BULLSEYE
Cassidy.description: Critical hit reduces [Combat Roll]'s cooldown by 2s.

Cassidy.name: DEAD MAN WALKING
Cassidy.description: Eliminating an enemy with a critical hit grants 1 Max Ammo for the round, up to 4.

Cassidy.name: FULL HOUSE
Cassidy.description: For each Ammo available, [Peacekeeper] 's primary fire gains 1 % increased damage, up to 25%.

Cassidy.name: QUICK DRAW
Cassidy.description: After using [Combat Roll], [Peacekeeper]'s next primary fire can auto-aim within 9m while under cooldown.

Cassidy.name: THINK FLASHT
Cassidy.description: When you start a [Combat Roll], leave a [Flashbang] behind.

Cassidy.name: BARREL ROLL
Cassidy.description: [Combat Roll] takes you 50% further and deals 65 damage to enemies.

Cassidy.name: JUST ROLL WITH IT
Cassidy.description: [Combat Roll] gains additional 25% damage reduction and heals 30% of your Life over 3s.

Cassidy.name: FLASH IN THE PAIN
Cassidy.description: Eliminating an enemy recently damaged by [Flashbang] grants 15% Ultimate Charge.

Cassidy.name: HOT POTATO
Cassidy.description: [Flashbang] adds 3 extra Ammo on hit until [Peacekeeper] is reloaded.

Cassidy.name: EASY RIDER
Cassidy.description: While using [Deadeye], gain 100 Overhealth and 25% Move Speed.

Cassidy.name: SUNRISE
Cassidy.description: Using [Deadeye] slows all visible enemies by 35% for 1.5s.

Genji.name: CYBERNETIC SPEED
Genji.description: Dealing damage with [Shuriken] grants 2% [Shuriken] Attack Speed for 3s, stacking up to 15 times.

Genji.name: HASHIMOTO'S BANE
Genji.description: After using an ability, your next secondary fire throws 2 extra [Shuriken] that seek enemies but deal 50% less damage.

Genji.name: SACRED SHURIKEN
Genji.description: [Shuriken]'s primary fire throws 2 additional [Shuriken] that don't consume any ammo.

Genji.name: HANAMURA HEALING
Genji.description: Critical hits and [Swift Strike] grant Overhealth equal to 25% of their damage dealt for 5s.

Genji.name: HIDDEN BLADE
Genji.description: Gain 60% Melee Lifesteal and increase [Quick Melee] damage by 15.

Genji.name: LACERATION
Genji.description: [Swift Strike] deals 35% additional damage over 3s to enemies hit.

Genji.name: WYRM'S MAW
Genji.description: Targets hit by [Shuriken] take 10% more damage from [Swift Strike] for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

Genji.name: FORGED UNDER FIRE
Genji.description: While [Deflect] is active, heal for 60% of the damage it prevents.

Genji.name: IAIDO STRIKE
Genji.description: After [Deflect] ends, quickly swing your [Dragonblade] once.

Genji.name: SPIRIT OF SOJIRO
Genji.description: When [Deflect] stops incoming damage, reduce the cooldown of [Swift Strike] by Is, up to 5s.

Genji.name: DRAGON'S BREATH
Genji.description: [Dragonblade] swings launch a large piercing projectile that deals 50% of [Dragonblade]'s damage.

Genji.name: DEFLECT-O-BOT
Genji.description: +50% Deflected Projectile Speed. During the first 1.5s of [Deflect], automatically deflect projectiles towards enemies.

Mei.name: EXTENDOTHERMICS
Mei.description: [Endothermic Blaster]'s primary fire range is increased by 6m.

Mei.name: FROST ARMOR
Mei.description: Gain Armor equal to 5% of the primary fire damage you deal, up to 100, until the end of the round.

Mei.name: PERMAFROST
Mei.description: Gain bonus health multiplier equal to 50% of your ability power. While above 30% ability power, grow 15% in size.

Mei.name: SLOWBALL
Mei.description: [Endothermic Blaster]'s secondary fire now shoots a snowball that applies 30% slow for Is on critical hit.

Mei.name: ICEBERG
Mei.description: [Ice Wall] spawns a mini [Blizzard] that slows enemies.

Mei.name: SNOWBALL FLIGHT
Mei.description: Jumping while mid-air creates a large [Ice Wall] pillar under you. (12s Cooldown)

Mei.name: TWICE AS ICE
Mei.description: When you use [Cryo-Freeze], reset the next cooldown of [Ice Wall].

Mei.name: COULDER
Mei.description: [Cryo-Freeze] now encases you in a rolling iceball that can knock back enemies and deal 20 damage.

Mei.name: CRYCLONE
Mei.description: [Cryo-Freeze] spawns a mini [Blizzard] that slows enemies.

Mei.name: FROST NOVA
Mei.description: When [Cryo-Freeze] ends, knock back nearby enemies, dealing 60 damage.

Mei.name: COLD BLASTER
Mei.description: [Endothermic Blaster]'s primary fire does 20% increased damage to enemies within [Blizzard].

Mei.name: BLIZZNADO
Mei.description: While within [Blizzard], heal 15% of your life every 1s.

Reaper.name: BACKSTABBER
Reaper.description: After using an ability, your next shot deals 50% additional damage over 3s to enemies struck from behind.

Reaper.name: HARVEST FEST
Reaper.description: [Hellfire Shotgun] hits have a 10% chance to spawn a Soul Globe. When picked up, restore 25% Life, 25% Ammo, and gain 25% Move Speed for 3s.

Reaper.name: REVOLVING RUIN
Reaper.description: Close-range (7m) [Hellfire Shotgun] hits grant 4% Attack Speed for Is, stacking up to 10 times.

Reaper.name: SHARED SIPHON
Reaper.description: [The Reaping] also heals the nearest ally within 10m for 30% of Reaper's damage dealt.

Reaper.name: SHROUDED SHRAPNEL
Reaper.description: Using [Wraith Form] increases the number of pellets per shot in your next magazine by 25% and its spread by 50%.

Reaper.name: VAMPIRIC TOUCH
Reaper.description: Hits with [Quick Melee] mark enemies for 5s. Allies gain 20% Lifesteal against marked enemies.

Reaper.name: DEATH STEP
Reaper.description: After using [Shadow Step], cast [Death Blossom] for 1.5s with 50% reduced damage.

Reaper.name: SILENT AS THE GRAVE
Reaper.description: Your footsteps and [Shadow Step] are significantly quieter.

Reaper.name: STRANGLE STEP
Reaper.description:
+30% [Shadow Step] Cast Speed.
After using [Shadow Step], double your Lifesteal for 3s.

Reaper.name: GHOSTED
Reaper.description: While in [Wraith Form], passing through enemies slows their Move Speed and Attack Speed by 30% for 3s.

Reaper.name: WRAITH RENEWAL
Reaper.description: While in [Wraith Form], restore 7% of your Life every 1s. Double this while below 50% Life.

Soldier: 76.name: PERIPHERAL PULSE
Soldier: 76.description: During [Tactical Visor], [Pulse Rifle] shoots at 1 additional enemy, dealing 50% damage.

Soldier: 76.name: SUPER VISOR
Soldier: 76.description: After using [Helix Rocket], activate [Tactical Visor] for 0.5s.

Soldier: 76.name: CHAINGUN
Soldier: 76.description: While continuously shooting [Pulse Rifle], each shot grants 0.4% Weapon Power, stacking up to 100 times.

Soldier: 76.name: MAN ON THE RUN
Soldier: 76.description: During [Sprint], restore 10% of your Ammo every Is and increase your Max Ammo by 10% until you reload, stacking up to 10 times.

Soldier: 76.name: CRATERED
Soldier: 76.description: Increase [Helix Rocket] explosion radius by 40% and explosion damage by 15%.

Soldier: 76.name: DOUBLE HELIX
Soldier: 76.description: [Helix Rocket] fires a second homing [Helix Rocket] that deals 70% reduced damage.

Soldier: 76.name: HUNKER DOWN
Soldier: 76.description: When [Helix Rocket] deals damage, create a [Biotic Field] with a 50% reduced duration at your position.

Soldier: 76.name: BACK OFF
Soldier: 76.description: Enemies within your [Biotic Field] take damage equal to 100% of its healing output.

Soldier: 76.name: BIOTIC BULLSEYE
Soldier: 76.description: While in [Biotic Field], critical hits restore 10% Max Ammo and extend the duration of [Biotic Field] by 0.5s, up to 5s.

Soldier: 76.name: FRONTLINERS
Soldier: 76.description: Allies in range of your [Biotic Field] when it spawns gain Overhealth equal to 25% of your max Life for 3s.

Soldier: 76.name: ON ME!
Soldier: 76.description: [Biotic Field] moves with you and grants you 20% increased Max Life while active.

Ana.name: NO SCOPE NEEDED
Ana.description: Landing unscoped shots with [Biotic Rifle] grants 10% Attack Speed for 2s, stacking up to 3 times.

Ana.name: PINPOINT PRESCRIPTION
Ana.description: [Biotic Rifle] can now critically hit both allies and enemies.

Ana.name: TACTICAL RIFLE
Ana.description: While scoped, [Biotic Rifle] will lock-on to allies for guaranteed hits.

Ana.name: COMFY CLOUD
Ana.description: [Sleep Dart] explodes on contact, hitting targets within 3m, but Sleep has a 50% reduced duration.

Ana.name: DREAMY
Ana.description: [Sleep Dart] can hit allies, healing 80% of their max Life over 4s instead of putting them to sleep.

Ana.name: SLEEP REGIMEN
Ana.description:
Gain 50 Health.
When you apply Sleep to an enemy, gain 10 Health, up to 150.

Ana.name: HOME REMEDY
Ana.description: [Biotic Grenade] grants Overhealth equal to 200% of its healing.

Ana.name: TIME OUT
Ana.description: [Biotic Grenade] now knocks enemies back and reduces their Move Speed by for 1.5s.

Ana.name: VENOMOUS
Ana.description: [Biotic Grenade] deals an additional 50 damage over its duration to enemies affected.

Ana.name: MY TURN
Ana.description: [Nano Boost] also applies to yourself for 50% of its duration.

Ana.name: OUR TURN
Ana.description: [Nano Boost] also affects other allies in your line of sight, but it has a 50% reduced duration on them.

Ana.name: YOUR FULL POTENTIAL
Ana.description: [Nano Boost] also grants the target 20% Ultimate Charge and 200 Overhealth.

Juno.name: MEDIMASTER
Juno.description: [Mediblaster] can now critically hit both allies and enemies.

Juno.name: STINGER
Juno.description: [Mediblaster] deals an additional 10 damage to enemies over 1s. (Does not stack).

Juno.name: COSMIC COOLANT
Juno.description: [Pulsar Torpedoes] cooldown is reduced by 0.5s for each target it hits.

Juno.name: MEDICINAL MISSILES
Juno.description: [Pulsar Torpedoes] causes allies hit to receive 50% more healing for 3s.

Juno.name: BLINK BOOSTS
Juno.description: [Glide Boost] gains 2 additional charges and has a 65% reduced cooldown, but has 75% reduced duration.

Juno.name: TORPEDO GLIDE
Juno.description: During [Glide Boost], every 50 damage you deal reduces the cooldown of [Pulsar Torpedoes] by 1s.

Juno.name: BLACK HOLE
Juno.description: [Hyper Ring] slows the Move Speed of enemies who pass through it by 35% for 2s.

Juno.name: HYPER HEALER
Juno.description: Allies affected by [Hyper Ring] gain 100 Overhealth.

Juno.name: RALLY RING
Juno.description: Reduce [Hyper Ring]'s cooldown by 1s when an ally passes through it.

Juno.name: ORBITAL ALIGNMENT
Juno.description: Enemies inside of [Orbital Ray] lose 35% Move Speed. Allies inside of it gain 25% Move Speed.

Juno.name: STELLAR FOCUS
Juno.description: [Orbital Ray] now follows you and its duration is increased by 35%.

Kiriko.name: FOXY FIREWORKS
Kiriko.description: After reloading, your next 3 thrown [Kunai] explode on contact, dealing 20 damage to nearby enemies.

Kiriko.name: KEEN KUNAI
Kiriko.description: [Kunai] critical hits decrease active ability cooldowns by 15% and refund 3 ammo.

Kiriko.name: TRIPLE THREAT
Kiriko.description: After using [Swift Step], for 4s, your secondary fire throws 2 additional [Kunai] in a spread that deal 50% less damage.

Kiriko.name: LEAF ON THE WIND
Kiriko.description: [Healing Ofuda] bounces to another ally up to 2 times, healing for 30% of the normal amount.

Kiriko.name: SELF-CARE
Kiriko.description: When you use [Healing Ofuda], each Ofuda thrown heals you for 15% of your max Life.

Kiriko.name: SUPPORTED SHOOTING
Kiriko.description: When [Healing Ofuda] heals allies, grant them 20% increased Attack Speed for 3s.

Kiriko.name: CLONE CONJURATION
Kiriko.description: After using [Swift Step], create a clone of yourself that lasts for 2.5s.

Kiriko.name: FLEET FOOT
Kiriko.description: [Swift Step] can be used directionally without a target.

Kiriko.name: CLEANSING CHARGE
Kiriko.description: When you cleanse negative effects with [Protection Suzu], gain 5% Ultimate Charge for each hero cleansed.

Kiriko.name: CROSSING GUARD
Kiriko.description: [Kitsune Rush] now also reduces enemies Move Speed by 50% for 2s.

Kiriko.name: SPIRIT VEIL
Kiriko.description: Using [Kitsune Rush] cleanses Kiriko of negative effects, and makes her Invulnerable for 4s.

Lúcio.name: FAST FORWARD
Lúcio.description: While above 50% Move Speed, increase damage by 30%.

Lúcio.name: SIGNATURE SHIFT
Lúcio.description: After using an ability, your next [Sonic Amplifier] shot shoots a volley of 6 ammo with 80% increased projectile size.

Lúcio.name: SONIC BOOM
Lúcio.description: [Sonic Amplifier] and [Quick Melee] Damage heals all allies affected by [Crossfade] equal to 30% of damage dealt.

Lúcio.name: MIXTAPE
Lúcio.description: When switching to [Healing Boost], [Crossfade] heals for 50% of [Crossfade] healing for every 1s [Speed Boost] was active.

Lúcio.name: MEGAPHONE
Lúcio.description: +15% [Amp It Up] Duration While [Amp It Up] is active, [Crossfade] radius is increased by 150%.

Lúcio.name: RADIO EDIT
Lúcio.description: After using [Amp It Up], trigger a [Sound Barrier] with 85% reduced Overhealth.

Lúcio.name: VIVACE
Lúcio.description: Every 1s you are [Wallriding], gain 3% Move Speed and 1.5% Attack Speed for 5s, stacking up to 10 times.

Lúcio.name: WALLVIBING
Lúcio.description: While [Wallriding] or airborne, gain temporary Overhealth equal to 3% of your life every 1s, up to 30%.

Lúcio.name: CROWD PLEASER
Lúcio.description: After using [Soundwave], heal all allies affected by [Crossfade] for 20.This healing is doubled while [Amp It Up] is active.

Lúcio.name: LET'S BOUNCE
Lúcio.description: [Soundwave] has 25% increased knockback and deals 25 bonus damage if the target hits a wall.

Lúcio.name: BEAT DROP
Lúcio.description: 20% Ultimate Cost Reduction. Landing on an enemy with [Sound Barrier] deals up to 200 damage.

Mercy.name: DISTORTION
Mercy.description: Allies boosted by [Caduceus Staff] gain Lifesteal.

Mercy.name: GLASS EXTRA FULL
Mercy.description: Healing from [Caduceus Staff] targeting full health allies is converted to Overhealth, up to 50.

Mercy.name: PROTECTIVE BEAM
Mercy.description: [Caduceus Staff] targets above 80% Life gain 10% Damage Reduction.

Mercy.name: SERENITY
Mercy.description: [Sympathetic Recovery] heals for 20% more and heals you even while you are healing a full health ally.

Mercy.name: THREADS OF FATE
Mercy.description: [Caduceus Staff] chains to your previous target for 3s, at 50% effectiveness.

Mercy.name: BATTLE MEDIC
Mercy.description: Every 1s your Staff is attached, [Caduceus Blaster] gains 4% Attack Speed (stacks 10 times) until you reload or swap to your Staff.

Mercy.name: EQUIVALENT EXCHANGE
Mercy.description: You have 3 charges of [Resurrect] with 33% reduced cast time, but their cooldowns only reset at the start of a round.

Mercy.name: FIRST RESPONDER
Mercy.description: When you [Resurrect] an ally, you both gain 250 Overhealth for 6s.

Mercy.name: THE WHAMBULANCE
Mercy.description: When [Guardian Angel] ends, heal your target for 4 Life for every 1m you traveled.

Mercy.name: TRIAGE UNIT
Mercy.description: When using [Guardian Angel] on allies below 50% Life, [Caduceus Staff] heals them 30% more for 3s.

Mercy.name: CREPUSCULAR CIRCLE
Mercy.description: While [Valkyrie] is active, the healing and damage boost of [Caduceus Staff] are automatically applied to nearby allies.

Moira.name: CHAIN GRASP
Moira.description: After using [Biotic Orb], [Biotic Grasp]'s secondary fire chains to 2 additional targets within 10m for 3s.

Moira.name: DECONSTRUCTION
Moira.description: After you spend 50 [Biotic Energy], deal 20% increased damage for 6s.

Moira.name: EMPOWERING YOU
Moira.description: [Biotic Grasp]'s secondary fire can target allies, increasing their damage by 15%.

Moira.name: ETHEREAL EXCISION
Moira.description: While aiming at an enemy's head with [Biotic Grasp]'s secondary fire, gain 30% Move Speed, 30% Lifesteal, and restore 100% more Biotic Energy.

Moira.name: OPTIMAL OVERFLOW
Moira.description: After you spend 50 [Biotic Energy], launch the last selected [Biotic Orb] with 75% reduced duration.

Moira.name: PRECARIOUS POTENCY
Moira.description: Allies healed by your [Biotic Grasp] are healed for an additional 25% of [Biotic Grasp]'s healing over 5s.

Moira.name: CROSS-ORBAL
Moira.description: [Biotic Orb] launches an additional [Biotic Orb] of the other type with 50% reduced capacity.

Moira.name: MULTIBALL
Moira.description: [Biotic Orb] launches 2 additional orbs of the chosen type with 85% reduced effectiveness.

Moira.name: PHANTASM
Moira.description: When you use [Fade], spawn a stationary copy of the last selected [Biotic Orb] with 50% reduced duration.

Moira.name: SCIENTIFIC DEATHOD
Moira.description: While using [Fade], passing through enemies grants 5% Ultimate Charge and Overhealth equal to 15% of your max Life.

Moira.name: VOIDHOPPERS
Moira.description: [Fade] also phases other allies within 8m for 0.25s and grants them Overhealth equal to 20% of your max Life.

Moira.name: DESTRUCTION'S DIVIDE
Moira.description: [Coalescence] can be toggled between pure healing or pure damage, with 30% greater effect.

Freja.name: CYCLONE
Freja.description: When you use [Updraft], fire a [Take Aim] bolt at your crosshair.

Freja.name: SEEKERPOINT
Freja.description: When [Take Aim] bolt sticks an enemy, automatically fire 3 additional crossbow shots at them that deal 66% reduced damage.

Freja.name: SEISMIC SHOT
Freja.description: [Take Aim] explosion radius is increased by 33%. Double this if the bolt is stuck to a target.

Freja.name: THREAD THE NEEDLE
Freja.description: [Take Aim] bolts pierce enemies. Additional explosions deal 66% reduced damage.

Freja.name: DEEP POCKETS
Freja.description: When you use an ability, restore 25% of your Max Ammo.

Freja.name: FORAGER
Freja.description: For 2s after using [Quick Dash], [Revdraw Crossbow] hits heal you for 4% of your Max Life.

Freja.name: PEAK PERFORMANCE
Freja.description: While firing [Revdraw Crossbow], your fall speed is decreased by 80%.

Freja.name: REDUX
Freja.description: [Revdraw Crossbow] hits against targets stuck by a [Take Aim] bolt or [Bola Shot] reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 5% and refunds 1 ammo.

Freja.name: VOLLEY À DEUX
Freja.description: Every fifth [Revdraw Crossbow] shot fires an additional 2 bolts in a spread that deal 33% reduced damage.

Freja.name: LILLE FÆLDE
Freja.description: After using [Updraft], your next [Take Aim] while airborne instead fires a [Bola Shot] that no longer pulls and has 50% reduced effectiveness.

Freja.name: SO COOKED
Freja.description: [Bola Shot]'s damaging zone deals 30% more damage and lingers for 2s. [Bola Shot] eliminations count towards [Bounty Hunting].

Freja.name: MIGHTY GUST
Freja.description: [Updraft] launches a wind blast towards your crosshair, knocking back enemies and dealing 40 damage.

Sigma.name: ZERO GRAVITY
Sigma.description: When you use an ability, gain the ability to fly for 2.5s.

Sigma.name: HYPERLOOP
Sigma.description: [Hyperspheres] direct hits reduce the cooldown of [Accretion] by 0.5s.

Sigma.name: TRINISPHERE
Sigma.description: Your primary fire launches a third [Hypersphere] that deals 50% reduced damage.

Sigma.name: EVENT HORIZON
Sigma.description: Damage absorbed by [Kinetic Grasp] also restores [Experimental Barrier]'s health. Excess is converted to Overhealth.

Sigma.name: SYMPHONIC SYZYGY
Sigma.description: When [Kinetic Grasp] ends, for every 100 damage absorbed gain 10% Attack Speed for 4s, stacking up to 4 times.

Sigma.name: ORBITAL BARRIER
Sigma.description: Get a mini [Experimental Barrier] that orbits around you. It has 50% reduced health.

Sigma.name: PHILHARMONIC FORTITUDE
Sigma.description: [Experimental Barrier] has 25% increased Max Health. Barrier health regenerates constantly but 50% slower while deployed.

Sigma.name: MASS DRIVER
Sigma.description: [Accretion] projectiles that pass through [Experimental Barrier] gain 300% Projectile Speed and deal 20% increased damage.

Sigma.name: SINGULARITY
Sigma.description: [Accretion] splash damage is increased by 25% and enemies are pulled towards its explosion.

Sigma.name: MAESTRO
Sigma.description: 50% Ultimate Cost Reduction. [Gravitic Flux] Radius is reduced by 50%.

Sigma.name: APOGEE ALIGNMENT
Sigma.description: When you use an ability, create 2 [Hyperspheres] that orbit around you. They explode on contact but deal 50% reduced damage.

Sigma.name: ASTROPHYSICAL
Sigma.description: [Quick Melee] causes enemies hit to levitate into the air for 1s. (10s Cooldown)

Junkrat.name: 2 FRAG 2 FRURIOUS
Junkrat.description: [Frag Launcher] has a 25% chance to shoot an additional projectile that deals 66% reduced damage.

Junkrat.name: BANGO!
Junkrat.description: [Frag Launcher] Direct Hits without bouncing Burn for 20% additional damage over 2s.

Junkrat.name: BIG BANG
Junkrat.description: When a [Frag Launcher] shot bounces, increase its projectile size by 33%.

Junkrat.name: BINGO!
Junkrat.description: [Frag Launcher] Direct Hits without bouncing reduce cooldown of abilities by 25%.

Junkrat.name: SOOT SHAKER
Junkrat.description: After detonating [Concussion Mine], gain 15% increased Attack Speed for 1.5s and restore 20% Max Ammo.

Junkrat.name: TRAP II, ESQUIRE
Junkrat.description: After [Concussion Mine] has landed for 0.5s, detonating it will spawn a mini [Steel Trap] that slows instead of immobilizing.

Junkrat.name: HOP BOOM
Junkrat.description: After launching yourself with [Concussion Mine], detonate a [Concussion Mine] wherever you land with 50% reduced effectiveness.

Junkrat.name: SLAPNEL
Junkrat.description: [Quick Melee] hits explode for up to 100% [Quick Melee] damage, knocking you and targets back (10s Cooldown).

Junkrat.name: GACHABOMB
Junkrat.description: +20% [Total Mayhem] Explosion Radius. [Total Mayhem] creates a random number of additional bombs.

Junkrat.name: RAININ' LEAD
Junkrat.description: After launching yourself, drop 1 [Total Mayhem] bomb with 25% reduced damage every 0.4s while airborne.

Junkrat.name: RIP ROLL
Junkrat.description: 20% Ultimate Cost Reduction. During your ultimate, enter your [Rip Tire]. Launch out when it is destroyed or triggered.

Zenyatta.name: FLYING KICK
Zenyatta.description: While airborne, [Quick Melee] becomes a dash kick that stuns if it knocks an enemy back into a wall. (5s Cooldown)

Zenyatta.name: IT'S ORBIN' TIME
Zenyatta.description: [Orb of Destruction]'s secondary fire can charge up to 3 additional orbs.

Zenyatta.name: SEEKING SALVATION
Zenyatta.description: [Orb of Destruction]'s secondary fire projectiles home when aimed at a target below 35% Life.

Zenyatta.name: DUAL HARMONY
Zenyatta.description: Gain a 2nd [Harmony Orb] but they both heal 45% less.

Zenyatta.name: ENLIGHTENMENT
Zenyatta.description: Allies affected by [Harmony Orb] are healed for 35% of the damage you deal.

Zenyatta.name: GOTTA HAVE FAITH
Zenyatta.description: [Harmony Orb] targets can be out of your line of sight for 5s longer before [Harmony Orb] returns to you.

Zenyatta.name: INNER PEACE
Zenyatta.description: Gain a [Harmony Orb] that is always attached to you. It heals for 75% less.

Zenyatta.name: DISCORD FEVER
Zenyatta.description: When [Discord Orb] is applied to a target, they take 50 damage over 5s.

Zenyatta.name: DISCORD INFERNO
Zenyatta.description: When you critically hit a target affected by your [Discord Orb], the [Orb of Destruction] explodes, dealing 50 damage.

Zenyatta.name: INSTANT KARMA
Zenyatta.description: When a target of your [Discord Orb] damages you, restore 30% of that damage over 2s.

Zenyatta.name: CIRCLE OF STRIFE
Zenyatta.description: While using [Transcendence], apply [Discord Orb] to all enemies within range.

Zenyatta.name: SOUL CONTROL
Zenyatta.description: [Transcendence] can be canceled early, saving up to 65% of your Ultimate Charge.
